author: artlbv
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a XGBoost-based producer for the HLT topological trigger which is targeting final states with muons, HT and b-tagged jets, for example HH bbWW/tautau [as presented in this TSG meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1644150/#37-paths-using-l1-topo-seeds) and in mode detail soon (to be linked).

This producer is meant to be run at HLT together with the newly added `HLTFloatThresholdFilter`.
No changes are expected to any running central code. 

The data (json files) are provided in this PR: https://github.com/cms-data/HLTrigger-HLTfilters/pull/2

#### PR validation:

The producer was tested with the test script provided in the test folder in special:
`HLTrigger/special/test/test_TopoXGBProducer_cfg.py`
There are three different models testing the different configuration set ups possible with the producer.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This will be backported to 16_0_X for data taking in 2026 (targeting HLT menu v1.1)
title: HLT topological trigger based on XGBoost for events with muons, HT and btags
